verbs.description: [ARG1: Ex - Texas congressman] [V: imprisoned] [ARGM-TMP: after fraud conviction] . Mueller moves to start sentencing process for Papadopoulos . Lawmakers briefed on FBI informant allegations . Associated Press : 14 U.S. Airmen disciplined over LSD use and distribution . North Korea invites reporters to watch destruction of nuclear sites . Trump : cancelled North Korea summit a “ missed opportunity . ”
